publicationStmt.p: Indication of work done and date 06/06/16, Wheaton College

sourceDesc.p: From the Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College

row.cell: To 17 3/4 lbs fresh pork 8 pr lb.
Settled by Doct as pr Bill
To Interest on Clocker + brothers note
To rent of House to April 1st
To cash to pay for flower

cell.name: Paid Geo M. Sweet for Pig

row.cell: To cash to go to Taunton last week
To Shawl 1.75. H Pd for Mrs. B. 6
To 7 Yds Calico fr her Mother 1.75
